#summary FDS syntax highlighting

Syntax highlighting is a feature of some text editors that display text in different colors and fonts according to the category of terms. This page lists various sources for FDS syntax highlighting applied to text editors.

[https://lh5.googleusercontent.com/_iTIkwVoSUm0/TXeUFa-EkjI/AAAAAAAAAcQ/CBnI6aioMaI/s512/gedit%20syntax%20high.png]

<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

----

= Fraise (former Smultron) text editor =

This plugin updates the list of Fraise syntax definitions. Do not hesitate to contact its developer in case of problems: [mailto:parsipal@gmail.com parsipal@gmail.com].

Download Fraise for Mac OSX from: [http://www.fraiseapp.com/]

Download the plugin from:
 * FDS 5.5.0 keywords: [http://www.tidestudio.com/DOWNLOAD/Smultron_SHxFDS5.5.x.zip Smultron_SHxFDS5.5.x.zip]
 * FDS 5.4.x keywords: [http://www.tidestudio.com/DOWNLOAD/Smultron_SHxFDS5.4.x.zip Smultron_SHxFDS5.4.x.zip]

This plugin is released under the GNU General Public License (GPL).

To install it:
 # Download and install Fraise text editor.
 # Quit Fraise before start installation process.
 # `Finder > Go > Application > Fraise.app`, then right click on it and choose `explore contained`.
 # Open the `Resource` directory;
 # Overwrite the `SyntaxDefinitions.plist`;
 # Open `Syntax Definitions` directory;
 # Copy `fds.plist` into it;
 # Now start Fraise and load any FDS input file.

= Gedit text editor =

Gedit is the official text editor of the Gnome desktop environment.

Download Gedit for Linux, Mac OSX, and MS Windows from: [http://projects.gnome.org/gedit/index.html]

Download the plugin from:
 * FDS 5.5.3 + EVAC keywords: [http://www.tidestudio.com/DOWNLOAD/gedit_highlight_FDS_553.zip gedit_highlight_FDS_553.zip]
 * FDS 5.5.2 + EVAC keywords: [http://www.tidestudio.com/DOWNLOAD/gedit_highlight_FDS_552.zip gedit_highlight_FDS_552.zip]
 * FDS 5.5.0 keywords: [http://www.tidestudio.com/DOWNLOAD/gedit_SHxFDS5.5.x.zip gedit_SHxFDS5.5.x.zip]
 * All FDS versions: [http://blenderfds.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/other/syntax%20highlight/gedit%20fds%20syntax%20highlight.zip gedit fds syntax highlight.zip]

This plugin is released under the GNU General Public License (GPL).

Copy this file to the following directories:
 * `~/.local/share/gtksourceview-2.0/language-specs/`
 or
 * `~/.gnome2/gtksourceview-2.0/language-specs/`
 * `~/.gnome2/gtksourceview-1.0/language-specs/`

= Notepad++ text editor =

Download Notepad++ for MS Windows from: [http://notepad-plus-plus.org/]

Download the plugin from: [http://code.google.com/p/blenderfds/downloads/list]

This plugin is released under the GNU General Public License (GPL).

To install it:
 # Unzip the downloaded file to a temporary location.
 # Locate your application data folder for Notepad++, i.e. `C:/My Documents and Settings/User/Application Data/Notepad++/`
 # Open userDefineLang.xml file. 
 # If `userDefineLang.xml` is blank, then simply replace the contents with `fds+evac.xml`.
 # If `userDefineLang.xml` contains other user defined languages, append `fds+evac.xml` contents to the existing file.
